section_title: CALENDAR OF MEETINGS OF CONVENTION BODIES
sentences: On 25 November, COP-6 addressed the issue of the calendar of meetings of the Convention bodies, and agreed to add the sessional periods for 2004.
The first sessional period was set for 14-25 June 2004; the second, for 29 November - 10 December (FCCC/CP/2000/1).
enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
